column2: "Rods are a key weapon in the Force arsenal. If you can't make up your mind, go with a rod."
"They boost the output of Techniques, and when you're cornered they can also be used as a melee weapon."
"You can set up to four Techniques to a rod. Match the use of each to your situation."
"So, do rods pique your interest? Then you might as well have mine. It's old, but it's still in working order."
"There's no manual, but it's quicker to get a feel for it by using it yourself, anyway. Why don't you give it a try?"
"Rods are basic Techniques weapons that can be used for standard attacks as well as to cast Techniques. They are easy to handle, even for beginners."
"Try basic rod attacks and Techniques for yourself."
